description.value:
The purpose of this profile is to represent key elements of clinical relevance (such as imaging examination name and image date time) to accompany a rich text representation of a diagnostic imaging report as issued by the diagnostic service provider or the electronic exchange of diagnostic imaging reports between healthcare providers, and between healthcare providers and the My Health Record system infrastructure in Australia.
#### Must Support
In the context of this profile [Must Support](http://hl7.org/fhir/R4/conformance-rules.html#mustSupport) SHALL be interpreted as follows:
* The system SHALL be able to include the element when authoring a resource where data is available
* The system SHALL be able to store and retrieve the element
* The system SHALL be able to process resources containing the element

short.value: A diagnostic imaging examination observation for a patient

definition.value: An observation of a diagnostic imaging examination for a patient. This observation may represent a single examination, or a group of examinations.
